column1: Events that occurred on .
==On Earth==
* 1939 - Actor David Weatherley is born.
* 1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 56.
* 1948 - Actor Steven M. Kramer is born.
* 1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Hans-Jörg Modlmayr (1 March 1967).
* 1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Miss E. Byrne (1 March 1968).
* 2001 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue Tyalië Tyelelliéva 16 is published.
* 2007 - The Company They Keep is published.
* 2007 - Electronic Arts releases The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology.
* 2010 - J.R.R. Tolkien: Pocket Guide is published.
* 2010 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Allies of the King
* 2010 - Oliphaunt Limited Edition Poster is published.
* 2013 - Vinyar Tengwar 50 is published.
==In Arda==
** Aragorn
** Frodo Baggins
column2: Samwise Gamgee and Gollum begin the passage of the Dead Marshes at dawn. They temporarily halt and hide from a flying Nazgûl.

column1: ** The Entmoot
** Aragorn enters Fangorn and meets Gandalf. They set out for Edoras.
** Faramir and his men leave for Ithilien to ambush the Southrons marching to Mordor.Category:Datesde:1. März1. maaliskuuta
